rules_text:
This spell can't be countered.
Whenever another nontoken creature you control dies, return it to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.
{6}{G}: Transform Krendel of Kessig. Activate only if it's attacking.
rules_text2:
Creature spells you cast can't be countered.
Whenever another nontoken creature you control dies, if it didn't have a +1/+1 counter on it, return it to the battlefield under your control with a +1/+1 counter on it.
At the beginning of your end step, if Krendel, Krallenhorde Alpha didn't attack this turn, transform it.
